scenario.title: Process a Purchase Order-Backed Invoice
scenario.description: An accountant receives a standard invoice from a supplier that has a corresponding purchase order and goods receipt note.

tasks.description: Capture the invoice data from the received document.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly extracts key data like invoice number, date, vendor, and line-item amounts.

tasks.description: Perform a 3-way match by comparing the invoice against the purchase order and the goods receipt note in the ERP system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that quantities, prices, and terms match across all three documents.

tasks.description: Post the invoice for payment, as the 3-way match was successful.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully posts the invoice in the ERP system, making it ready for the next payment run.
